text:
@SpeakerPelosi @SpeakerPelosi We can’t solve the COVID-19 problem without the tools to do so. Every day President Trump fails to utilize the Defense Production Act & Senate.

Nancy: Give it up. Democrats use fake stats and lies every day. Next time you tell the truth will be the first.
